data.value: A luxury Maison, founded in 1906 in Hamburg, Germany. A brand that, over time, has gained worldwide recognition like almost no other luxury brand. A brand with an unmistakable trademark.
And, since 1924, a brand with an iconic product: the Meisterstück.
We are a Maison loved for our superb quality, commitment to perfection, innovative spirit and high renown in the world of writing instruments.
Pioneering and passion are cornerstones of our strength.

Based on our strong roots, we have an authentic belief: Everyone can leave a mark.
We live in uncertain times of profound change. Montblanc is successful as a brand for business people. But business is evolving into a blend of private and professional life. In addition, our clients expect a seamless, personal experience when in touch with our Maison.

This is our chance to make a difference and to succeed! We have already adapted our brand positioning to luxury business-lifestyle. That is where our clients are and where we belong as a brand. It lets us inspire our clients in their day-to-day life, raise relevance and increase our desirability.

This will only work if we change in a number of ways. We will modernise our Maison. We will stop doing whatever does not help us on our way. We will develop in those areas that are crucial for our success.
Focused! Consistent!

We have all the ingredients for success:
A very strong and renowned brand,
a highly dedicated and committed team and a clear mission:
Empower people to leave their mark.
A meeting between our Maison ExCo, the category heads and regional presidents to discuss:​
The strategic direction for our Maison, getting direct feedback and challenging each other in a constructive way.​
Topics around the organisation and corporate culture, allowing general concepts to be pitched and tested.​
It aims to:​​
Give new colleagues the chance to connect with each other.​
Help them to start building a network.​
It aims to:​​
Digital tools are essential to facilitate everyday collaboration. At Montblanc, we use Teams or Asana to provide quick and easy ways to collaborate.
Gather new joiners (Manager level and above) at headquarters to hear about the strategy, visit MONTBLANC HAUS and manufacture and meet colleagues from around the world.
Build a sustainable international network.
Establish a common understanding of our Maison’s heritage stories.
Providing effective feedback can be challenging. These competency model training sessions help new joiners to:
Grasp this by emphasising unbiased observation.
Cultivate psychological safety in relation to open feedback.
It aims to:​
Focus on strengths, individual potential and development, thus creating a culture characterised by trust and mutual feedback.​
Montblanc’s Human Resources and Retail Academy have joined forces to establish a holistic learning culture on a global scale.​
They aim to:​
Link our Montblanc family with subject matter experts.​
Offer unprecedented content, delving into behind-the-scenes subjects.​
Enhance storytelling by sharing the vast wealth of Montblanc's heritage.​
It is our North Star that exists to:​
Guide us on how we want our client to feel in a Montblanc boutique. ​
Ensure clients feel welcomed like family with their interests at the centre. ​
Help our clients develop a unique relationship with Montblanc that drives conversion and long-term loyalty. ​
